comments:
Description:
NPE when save a report with a parameter containing duplicate values
Build number:2.2.1.v20070920

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter, listbox, tick on Allow Duplicate Value.
2. Add two same values, click OK.
3. Save the report

Expected result:
No Exception when save the report.

Actual result:
NPE.
